channel.title: One click pick up?
channel.description:
heya , im working with reapage and i whould like to add 1 click pick up and if anyone whould help it whould be awesome
oo and also how whould i add a timer on log out , and a timer for food , pots ?
thanks for any help , lewis.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2009, 11:41:30 am[/size][hr]oohhh and how about a stop on logging out in combat? thanks again :)

item.title: One click pick up?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Pressed for time; client.java, or client most search this:

case (ID of the item): In there add

if(itemTimer == 0) { In process() add

if(itemTimer > 0) itemTimer--; Declare

public int itemTimer = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: One click pick up?
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

_™:

Simple timers can be applied to food cases, the logout button, potions, and if(inCombat()) sendMessage("You must wait to logout:); should suffice.

Could you tell me what files? what to search , please.

im actually quite new to this and my brother wont help me -.-
